leads.lead_text: Leaf-blades firm, folded, glabrous or minutely pubescent on the lower (outer) surface; lemmas 2.7–3.8 mm long
Leaf-blades rather flaccid, flat or weakly folded, moderately densely pubescent on both surfaces; lemmas 1.5–2.6 mm long
